title: hari caraNavemba
sahitya:
hari caraNavemba suradhEnuvannu guru bOdheyemba kaNNisi kaTTirayya


caraNam 1    bhaktiyemba karuvanu biTTu nirata virathiyemba ganadaLeyanu hAki 
yuktavAda anityakAya carigeyoLage muktavara rAma nAmava karedu koLLiro
    caraNam 2    kAma krOdha lObha mOha mada matsara aham mai kuruLa tALiyena mADi 
snAnAsagnAnAgi puTagaidu SaDindriyangaLa hEma toLa nIrinalli berasi kAyaliDiro
    caraNam 3    shAnta guNavemba hadanaridu Arisi matte A bhrAntu mana majjigeya heppanikki 
EkAnta viSNumaya mandaNeyoL sOdisi dantA kaDagolige nENugaLa bigidu
    caraNam 4    para brahmavemba beNNeya muddeyana tegedu sharaNumaNiyemba tuppavane kAsi 
maravemba nore tegedu hasanAda amrtavanu nirata hrdayavemba koDana tumbirayya
    caraNam 5    anavarata smaraNe bisurigeyanu addi anuvAgi kuLituNDu biDade tEgi 
cinumaya cidAnanda purandara viTTalana anudinadali nene nenedu sakhiyAgirayya
